meanings.definition: A green or brownish mineral of the garnet group.
meanings.sent1: The geologist found a beautiful grossularite during the excavation.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry store displayed a stunning grossularite necklace in the window.
meanings.sent3: The grossularite gem sparkled like emeralds under the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes shone with the intensity of a thousand grossularites.
meanings.sent5: The grossularite's color was as vibrant as a lush forest in spring.

meanings.definition: A variety of garnet consisting of calcium aluminum silicate.
meanings.sent1: The jeweler carefully set the grossularite into the silver ring.
meanings.sent2: The mineralogist identified the rare grossularite sample under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The grossularite seemed to wink mischievously from its display case.
meanings.sent4: The grossularite's beauty was as captivating as a starry night sky.
meanings.sent5: The deep green hue of the grossularite reminded her of a lush meadow.
